mapper.sql: SELECT MNU_ID, MNU_NM, PRT_MNU_ID, SRC_MNU_ID, IS_INC, MNU_TYPE, LVL, SORT_NUM, USE_YN, URL, IS_DEL FROM ${tableName}
mapper.select: /** menu.selectMenuFindByUrl */ SELECT CM.MNU_ID, CM.PRT_MNU_ID, CM.LVL, CM.MNU_NM, CM.SRC_MNU_ID, CM.MNU_TYPE, PM.PRT_MNU_ID ST_MNU_ID FROM TB_FOR_MNU CM LEFT JOIN TB_FOR_MNU PM ON CM.PRT_MNU_ID=PM.MNU_ID WHERE CM.IS_DEL='N' AND CM.USE_YN='Y' AND CM.URL=#{value } LIMIT 1

/** menu.selectMenuTree */
WHERE IS_DEL='N' AND IS_INC='Y' ORDER BY SORT_NUM
mapper.insert: /** menu.selectMenuTree */ INSERT INTO TB_FOR_MNU ( MNU_ID, MNU_NM, PRT_MNU_ID, SRC_MNU_ID, LVL, SORT_NUM, USE_YN, IS_INC, MNU_TYPE, URL, IS_DEL INSRT_ID, INSRT_DATE, UPDT_ID, UPDT_DATE ) VALUES( #{mnuId}, #{mnuNm}, #{prtMnuId}, #{srcMnuId}, #{mnuType}, #{lvl}, #{sortNum}, #{useYn}, #{isInc }, #{mnuType }, #{url } #{isDel}, #{insrtId}, NOW(), #{updtId}, NOW() )
mapper.update: /** menu.updateMenu */ UPDATE TB_FOR_MNU SET MNU_NM=#{mnuNm }, PRT_MNU_ID=#{prtMnuId}, SRC_MNU_ID=#{srcMnuId}, LVL=#{lvl}, SORT_NUM=#{sortNum}, USE_YN=#{useYn}, IS_INC=#{isInc }, MNU_TYPE=#{mnuType }, URL=#{url } IS_DEL=#{isDel}, UPDT_ID=#{updtId}, UPDT_DATE=now() WHERE MNU_ID=#{mnuId }
